children.value: Enter the following command in bash.
curl -s https://api.github.com/users/[UserName]/repos | grep "clone_url" | awk '{print $2}' | sed -e 's/"//g' -e 's/,//g' | xargs -n1 git clone
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Clone All Repositories of a GitHub User","date":"2020-02-02T00:00:00.000Z","tags":["Git","Nifty Scripts"]}
